text:
@SpeakerPelosi As House Democrats continues your work. What a joke!!! Just the sound of that makes me sick. The Democrats are the ones that like you, laughed at the Coronavirus. Than went on to tell people to mingle and party as usual. 
All you House Democrats should be impeached.
